name: VV Daily Manifest - Notion Template
description: If you're familiar with Jack Butcher and his work under the Visualize Value brand, The Daily Manifest needs no introduction.It's a tool that Jack designed to help people structure their days and align their short-term actions with their long-term goals.The original tool is available for free in PDF format and can be downloaded here.Why I built thisThe printed version of the Daily Manifest requires a fresh sheet for each day.
